Conficker Lyrics

Song by Darksoft from Brain · 2018
Watch out for the men in black
We’re not just a Hollywood construct
I can wipe your mind straight clean
When I push the pedal

Synapse-circuit attack
Locked up, no link to your sight
All the highways that you drove
Were longer in reality

We choose what gets through
To make a world just for you

Watch out for the door in back
Your mind is their plastic wrap
They will sculpt another dream
And throw — throw away the key

They choose what you see
And lock away what is real
What is real?

Pick and choose what to save
Write it down — find a way
Hold your thought till it’s lost
Hide your sight when they come

We choose what you feel
No view into reality
Your life is ours
Permanently

I know it’s hard to grasp
So drop it now

Stream Now
